scripts.build: npm run build -w @speki/core && npm run build -w @speki/server && npm run build -w @speki/cli && npm run build -w @speki/web
scripts.build:cli: npm run build -w @speki/core && npm run build -w @speki/server && npm run build -w @speki/cli
scripts.dev: npm run build:cli && concurrently -n web,api -c cyan,green "npm run dev -w @speki/web" "node packages/cli/dist/index.js dashboard --no-open"
